You also want to modify the skateboard to maple material, 34 inch, graphic. If that is not possible, cancel the order since you no longer need this one. 
Finally, you also want to know the total price for all the grills you have bought in previous orders.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I actually need some help with an order I placed. I accidentally ordered a fleece jacket that I don't want. Is it possible to remove just that item from my pending order? If not, I would like to cancel the whole order. Also, I want to modify the skateboard in the order to be made of maple material, 34 inches, with a graphic design. If that modification isn't possible, then I would prefer to cancel the order since I no longer need it. Lastly, could you tell me the total price for all the grills I've bought in previous orders? My name is Ava Nguyen, and my zip code is 94128. I don't remember my email address.
